Real-Time Compliance for In-House Teams

Our Accessibility Monitoring Platform, developed by PopeTech and powered by the trusted WAVE engine, is designed for in-house development teams and digital agencies that manage multiple websites. This platform ensures ongoing compliance with WCAG, Section 508, and local accessibility standards, allowing your team to focus on building accessible content from the start. Supported by DHS Certified Trusted Testers, this monitoring service provides comprehensive coverage and actionable insights to help you maintain an accessible web presence.

The platform comes with support by A11y Developers that are DHS Certified Trusted Testers to assist as needed and a Proof of Compliance (POC) Certificate providing transparent documentation that verifies your websiteâ€™s commitment to accessibility. This certificate serves as a powerful asset, communicating to visitors, stakeholders, and clients that your site meets legal accessibility requirements and adheres to ADA standards.

Key Features of the Accessibility Monitoring Platform

  • Unlimited Access: Supports unlimited users, websites, groups, and rescanning capabilities, allowing you to cover every aspect of your digital portfolio.
  • Custom Page Limits: Plans are tailored to accommodate your specific needs, ensuring flexibility across large or small websites.

  • Comprehensive Scanning: Includes the ability to scan behind logins, templates, co-branded pages, Single Sign-On (SSO), and more. This flexibility is crucial for evaluating complex, secure web environments.
  • On-Demand and Scheduled Scans: Set up automated, scheduled scans to monitor accessibility continuously, or trigger on-demand scans when updates are made.

  • Hands-On Support: We provide personalized onboarding and detailed training sessions to help your team fully leverage the platformâ€™s features, ensuring a smooth transition and effective use of monitoring tools.

  • Professional Support: Our experts are available via email and Zoom to assist your team with any accessibility queries, providing reliable guidance and solutions.

  • Regular Updates: Receive monthly reports detailing accessibility performance and focus on specific topics, such as alternative text, keyboard navigation, and color contrast.
  • Built-In Training Resources: Access unlimited user resources, including training materials related to each monthâ€™s focus, helping your team stay informed and up-to-date.

  • Inclusive Training: All plans include five training seats that grant access to live, online accessibility training sessions, quarterly webinars, and our annual accessibility conference.
  • Accessibility Help Desk: Reach out to our help desk specialists for guidance on specific accessibility issues and test results.

  • Scheduled Manual Testing: In addition to automated scans, schedule and track manual testing sessions to ensure thorough accessibility coverage, with notes and results integrated into your regular reports.

Donâ€™t let accessibility challenges stand in the way of your websiteâ€™s success. Our Accessibility Monitoring Platform makes it easy for your team to track, report, and address accessibility issues, ensuring that your site remains compliant and user-friendly.

Why Choose Our Accessibility Monitoring Platform?

  • Certified Accessibility Experts: Our team includes DHS Certified Trusted Testers and experienced Certified Accessibility Developers. We bring deep expertise to support your team in meeting and maintaining web accessibility standards.
  • Scalable and Flexible: From automated testing to manual assessment tracking, our platform offers a complete solution for your entire portfolio, regardless of complexity or security requirements.
  • Empowering Training and Ongoing Support: We provide continuous training resources, monthly accessibility updates, and dedicated support, equipping your team with the tools and knowledge to maintain high standards in accessibility.

Always Remember

Automated testing does not replace manual testing. Only a human can determine if a website is ada compliant.
The combination of a Certifed A11y developer and an A11y Platforme will set your team and project apart form others.

Mission Statement

Kaffeinated Kodemonkey's mission is to make the digital world inclusive by ensuring accessibility for all.

We help businesses achieve ADA compliance and mentor the next generation of A11y developers, shaping a future centered on digital inclusivity.
